body: @tj, whether git submodules are nicer than checking all the source is very much subjective. There are pros & cons either way, and people will weigh those differently. But if you prefer submodules yourself, you have to weigh that against the inability to alter what you check in with `+build` tags and the inability to use `go test ./...` indiscriminately. You'll just have to specify which tests you want to run yourself, or configure your codereview or CI system or editor to run the tests you actually care about.
